entry.value: import pandas as pd%%00010import numpy as np%%00010%%00010hourly=input_table_1%%00010columns_par=hourly.columns%%00010demand = input_table_2%%00010#print(y_eprod.shape)%%00010demand.set_index(['Years', 'Country'], inplace=True)%%00010demand.sort_index(inplace=True)%%00010%%00010num_list=[8784, 17568, 26352, 35136]%%00010h_val=hourly.values%%00010%%00010h_val_ca=np.divide(h_val[:num_list[0],:], h_val[:num_list[0],:].sum(axis=0))%%00010h_val_da=np.divide(h_val[num_list[0]:num_list[1],:], h_val[num_list[0]:num_list[1],:].sum(axis=0))%%00010h_val_cw=np.divide(h_val[num_list[1]:num_list[2],:], h_val[num_list[1]:num_list[2],:].sum(axis=0))%%00010h_val_dw=np.divide(h_val[num_list[2]:,:], h_val[num_list[2]:,:].sum(axis=0))%%00010%%00010#print(h_val.shape)%%00010#print(demand.info(), demand)%%00010d_val_1=demand['bld_energy-demand_non-residential_appliances_electricity[TWh]'].values%%00010d_val_2=demand['bld_energy-demand_residential_appliances_electricity[TWh]'].values%%00010d_val_3=demand['bld_energy-demand_non-residential_hot-water_electricity[TWh]'].values%%00010d_val_4=demand['bld_energy-demand_residential_hot-water_electricity[TWh]'].values%%00010%%00010ca_hval=np.multiply(h_val_ca, d_val_1)%%00010#print(ca_hval.shape)%%00010da_hval=np.multiply(h_val_da, d_val_2)%%00010#print(da_hval.shape)%%00010cw_hval=np.multiply(h_val_cw, d_val_3)%%00010#print(cw_hval.shape)%%00010dw_hval=np.multiply(h_val_dw, d_val_4)%%00010#print(dw_hval.shape)%%00010%%00010aw_val=ca_hval+da_hval+cw_hval+dw_hval%%00010%%00010############## check ################%%00010aw_h=pd.DataFrame(aw_val, columns=columns_par)%%00010output_table=aw_h%%00010%%00010
